# 评论: 6

; Tue, 09 Jul 2024 21:00:00 +0000 https://aiencoder.substack.com/p/graphrag-analysis-part-1-how-indexing屋顶禅https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=40921038 https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=40921038 Show HN: Maelstrom – A Hermetic, Clustered Test Runner for Python and Rust

大家好，

Maelstrom 是一套工具，用于在本地机器上的密封微容器中或分布在任意大型集群中运行测试。 Maelstrom 目前有 Rust 和 Python 的测试运行程序，更多内容正在开发中。您可以使用 Maelstrom 来运行测试，因为：

 * It's easy. Maelstrom functions as a drop-in replacement for cargo test and pytest. In most cases, it just works with your existing tests with minimal configuration. * It's reliable. Maelstrom runs every test hermetically in its own lightweight container, eliminating confusing errors caused by inter-test or implicit test-environment dependencies. * It's scalable. Maelstrom can be run as a cluster. You can add more worker machines to linearly increase test throughput. * It's clean. Maelstrom has built a rootless container implementation (not relying on Docker or RunC) from scratch, in Rust, optimized to be low-overhead and start quickly. * It's fast. In most cases, Maelstrom is faster than cargo test, even without using clustering. Maelstrom's test-per-process model is inherently slower than pytest's shared-process model, but Maelstrom provides test isolation at a low performance cost.
虽然到目前为止我们的重点是运行测试，但 Maelstrom 的底层作业执行系统是通用的。我们提供了一个命令行实用程序来运行任意命令，以及用于编程访问和控制的基于 gRPC 的 API 和 Rust 绑定。

欢迎反馈和提问！感谢您尝试一下。

; Tue, 09 Jul 2024 18:25:03 +0000 https://www.theregister.com/2024/07/08/github_copilot_dmca/萨姆彭克https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=40919253 https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=40919253 Ask HN: How do browsers isolate internal audio from microphone input?

我注意到 Chrome 和 Chromium 中的一个有趣功能：它们似乎将内部音频与麦克风输入隔离。例如，当我在一个选项卡中进行 Google Meet 通话并在另一选项卡中以最大音量播放 YouTube 视频时，Google Meet 不会拾取该视频的音频。如果我对每个任务使用不同的浏览器（例如，Chrome 上的 Google Meet 和 Chromium 上的 YouTube），这种隔离就不会发生。

有谁知道 Chrome 和 Chromium 如何实现这种音频隔离？

鉴于 Chromium 是开源的，如果有人能向我指出处理此问题的代码库的特定部分，将会很有帮助。任何见解或技术细节将不胜感激！

评论网址： https://news.ycombinator.com/item? id=40918152

积分：169
